properties.name: orderserver.strategy
properties.description: Determines the strategy to be used when dispatching couriers (match, fifo).

properties.name: orderserver.thread-count
properties.description: The total amount of threads to concurrently poll events from the notification queue.

properties.name: orderserver.period-shut-down-monitor-millis
properties.description: time in seconds for checking if there are pending orders on the queue.

properties.name: orderserver.polling-max-retries
properties.description: The total amount of retries available before attempting to shut down the consumer threads.

properties.name: orderserver.polling-time-millis
properties.description: The sleep time of concurrent threads after polling the notification queue.

properties.name: courier.min-eta
properties.description: Courier travel time lower boundary for the uniformly distribution.

properties.name: courier.max-eta
properties.description: Courier travel time upper boundary for the uniformly distribution.
